snippet: Failure to provide proper rehabilitation for young offenders has led to a deal that could bring change to the system there and provide a model for the nation.
abstract: Editorial highlights Justice Department report on deplorable juvenile justice system in Tennessee; embraces reforms set forth in settlement agreement between Justice Department and state juvenile court, saying it could provide model for improving juvenile justice systems nationwide.
lead_paragraph: Failure to provide proper rehabilitation for young offenders has led to a deal that could bring change to the system there and provide a model for the nation.
